products.title: Neo, Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: The neo thunder is a grey-blue, ornately patterned filter blind that is sure to add something a little different to your home. The high quality fabric hangs on an easy-to-use rolling mechanism, so using this blind is as simple you would want it to be. Unite the thunder with creams, greys, and muted blues in an older child's bedroom or playroom for a subtle and fun style; or use in the guest bedroom to give your visitors a warm and eye-catching welcome.

products.title: Neo, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something natural, yet not plain, the neo natural might just be the blind for you. This light-filtering blind combines a subtle beige background with off-white patterning, perfect for adding character without intruding on existing dcor. Craft a calming home office space that will help you concentrate and relax while you work, by combining the natural with other soft neutrals and creams.

products.title: Neo, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Neo's aqua comprises of a speckled turquoise background on which sits an intricate symmetrical patterning, providing contemporary style to any window. And you won't lose all the light when you close it, as this filter blind allows light to penetrate through into your room. Place the aqua in the family bathroom, amongst white tiles and accenting accessories, or use for a cool, relaxing feel in a light taupe bedroom, where you're looking for both function and style, without the fuss.

products.title: Ardwell, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The ardwell in aqua is made from a quality fabric that is functional, lightweight, and adorned with beautifully printed curvaceous plant designs that enliven the senses. The crisp white contrasts stunningly with the weathered beige background, whilst the duck-egg blue is always a calming colour to have in any home. Perfect for complementing rooms with plain walls and floors, the aqua is certainly a work of art all its own.

products.title: Woodland, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: Woodland natural combines a simple and neutral on-trend colour with a unique texture to give an added layer of unexpected depth to your decor. It's these little touches that bring the fabric to life, and make you feel at home as soon as you put your key in the door. If you want to be able to turn on the style in the dining room, why not treat yourself to some slate flooring and a matching thick wooden topped table? These are the sort of rustic meets contemporary touches that woodland natural was made to hang by.

products.title: Ashanti, Olive - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours. The olive adds mellow green stripes to the backdrop of cream, grey, and black to form a cool, contemporary look. The olive is perfect for when you want to add a few dashes of natural green to a room, without dominating it with a pure green, one-colour blind. Why not make a virtue of the green stripes, and use the olive to subtly change the colour scheme of your room? Ashanti, olive - roller blind the ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours.

products.title: Saphira, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and admire saphira natural, you come to appreciate the elegant way in which the colours have combined to create something that is very much greater than the sum of their parts. The clever use of calming greens and soothing blues really does give the fabric a life of its own. We love the idea of working in a powdery sunrise orange so that that you can turn the master bedroom into the space that greets you with a smile when you wake each morning.

products.title: Grosvenor, Nice - Roller Blind
products.description: The grosvenor nice is one of their most modern and stylish blinds. Combining a neutral, light beige background with a beautifully arranged assortment of contemporary sketched plants and flowers, this offering from the grosvenor range is a must-have. The natural feel and imagery of the nice make this ideal as an accompaniment to a hearty, home-cooked meal in the kitchen or dining room. Alternatively, why not use in the lounge so you can appreciate the unique artwork this blind will add to your home as you sit and relax? Grosvenor, nice - roller blind the grosvenor nice is one of their most modern and stylish blinds.

products.title: Tranquil, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The tranquil in aqua is comprised of delicate teal and soft brown florals and leaves, set on a pale taupe-cream backdrop that will provide just enough shade and plenty of privacy, whilst still allowing some of that all-important daylight to trickle in. For a calming influence in your home office, surround the aqua with soft creams and light woods, only accenting occasionally with gentle teals and creamy cappuccinos.

products.title: Tranquil, Fresh - Roller Blind
products.description: A stunningly light combination of summer yellows, baby blues, and dusk greens, the tranquil in fresh is set on a pale cream background that allows the light to filter through and fill the room with a soft, sunny glow. For a quiet elegance in the kitchen or living room, offset the fresh with matching hues and light, unobtrusive woods, so that you can sit back and enjoy the subtle beauty of this blind in peace.

products.title: Liberty, Prussia - Roller Blind
products.description: The liberty prussia is a modern and jazzy take on a classic floral pattern, with fun shapes and lively greens and blues. This is a filter blind, giving you all the privacy you need without reducing the light levels too much. Match soft furnishings and accessories to the apple green and sky blue patterning, and place against cream walls in your home office. Or if you're a fan of bolder colours, sit amongst mid-charcoal grey walls in your contemporary dining room or living space.

products.title: Nature, Dawn - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at nature dawn, and you'll see the intricacy of the colours in all their glory. The gentle light greys have a hint of blue, and create a hue that fills your spaces with energy and vitality first thing in the morning. If you want to be able to make the guest bedroom your favourite room in the house, dawn could well be the missing piece of the puzzle that you've been searching high and low for.

products.title: Linara Spc, Ice - Roller Blind
products.description: Celebrate the crisp and refreshing shade of linara spc ice by allowing yourself to rest and relax every time you see it. For those of you who love to integrate contemporary colours with more traditional decor, it holds the keys to unlocking an incredible new look. If you want to match with spc ice you need to think beyond the normal colour combinations. Colours that breathe new life into spaces like powder blues and washed out mint greens are exciting ideas that you may want to pursue a little further.

products.title: Grosvenor, Kakiiro - Roller Blind
products.description: The grosvenor kakiiro is a lightweight and stylish roller-blind. The neutral backdrop serves as a canvas for a selection of sketched flower designs, that are highlighted with an eye-catching combination of fashionable stone greys and vibrant summer oranges. The kakiiro is perfect if you are looking to add a touch of artistic flair to the sitting room or master bedroom. Alternatively, use in the kitchen where the clever use of orange highlighting will add a touch of colour without overpowering your existing theme.

products.title: Tranquil, Summer - Roller Blind
products.description: Delicate water-paint florals set a beautifully peaceful scene on the tranquil summer, with pretty wildflowers in rich purples, deep pinks, and pale lilacs. The cream, light-filtering backdrop has a near translucent feel, perfect for watching the light trickle through on a sunny day. The summer will add delicacy and charm to a country kitchen, where it can sit elegantly amongst light cream walls and units, accented by pinks and purples to bring out the gorgeous hues in this attractive blind.

products.title: Garden City, Fresh - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city fresh instantly caught their eye, and with good reason. The homely colours bring any space to life, and are everything you need to approach your decor from a completely different angle. As you take a closer look you'll soon see that it offers a subtle layer of depth you didn't see first time around. We love the idea of using city fresh in the kitchen so that the homely shades and hues can add some inspiration when you're perfecting your next culinary creation.

products.title: Cottage Garden, Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at the vibrancy of the reds on display in cottage garden rose, it's easy to forget the beauty of the understated greens. The lack of a black outline allows you to enjoy each colour in relation to its neighbours, and leaves you with an impression of natural simplicity. We love the idea of using garden rose in the upstairs landing so that you can breathe new life into one of the more hard to decorate parts of the home.

products.title: Saphira, Berry - Roller Blind
products.description: Our saphira berry fabric gives you a touch of natural inspiration, married in perfect harmony to a selection of lively colours that will bring any space to life. It's all about losing yourself in the moment, and standing back to admire the artisan skill that goes into creating it. If you want to build a theme around berry, you need to allow yourself to get creative with your use of little pockets of colour.

products.title: Grosvenor, Tokyo - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and admire grosvenor tokyo hanging in your home you come to appreciate the skill and craft that has gone into creating this playful and eclectic design. The way in which the minimalist florals are scattered across the fabric make look accidental, but really it's years in the making. Using warm white lighting and hessian are great ways to extend the theme started by tokyo and take them right the way around the room.

products.title: Nature, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: Nature dusk allows you to lose yourself in a symphony of dark and light tones that work together in perfect harmony. As you look at the intricacy of the lines, you come to appreciate how the lack of definitive black boarders gives the fabric a life all of its own we love the idea of pairing nature dusk with rustic wooden furniture and some hessian wall art. A large coffee table in the middle of the floor, a mason jar of fairy lights, and some throws over the backs of the couches would also be inspired choices.

products.title: Garden City, Warm Glow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city warm glow allows you to introduce a smattering of hearty tones to your home in just a couple of minutes. The soothing colour spread is perfect when you want to enhance any space, and works particularly well when you want to shed new light on a compact spare bedroom. As well as your new roller blinds, consider smart storage solutions like storage boxes that slide effortless under the bed, a chest of drawers that doubles as a dress, and recessed wardrobe storage.

products.title: Liberty, Kakiiro - Roller Blind
products.description: The kakiiro is a high quality filter blind from the liberty range, allowing light to filter through even when it's closed. The cream magnolia background, combined with the sunny orange patterning, will only add to the pretty glow from the sunlight, giving any room a cheery, summer feel. Place in the living room to tame charcoal grey walls or to liven up cream or taupe ones. Or instead, add some colour to a plain hallway or upstairs landing, where the kakiiro will instantly inject a little style and brightness.

products.title: Abstract, Seafoam - Roller Blind
products.description: Seafoam allows you to rest and relax like never before as you sit back and take in the subtly altering colours that define the fabric. The greys add a timeless quality to the design, whilst it's the sea greens that remind you of those lazy days spent down by the coast. What you see in seafoam is very much up to you, so use this as a starting point for your bedroom's new look. It's your space which means you should have it whichever way you like.

products.title: Daphne, Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: The daphne in charcoal is a simple and neutral blind with a pretty and wistful dandelion fairy patterning. The fabric is soft and light, so light can filter through even when the blind is closed, and the smooth, effortless rolling mechanism makes for durable, easy-to-use window covering. Pair the charcoal with light browns and soft taupes in the bedroom, for a fresh, natural dcor style. Or instead, complement creams and golds to create a luxurious yet not over the top living space or dining room.

products.title: Riviera Stripe, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The riviera stripe smoke is a top quality, lightweight fabric, woven into the most contemporary of modern and eye-catching designs. Giving a full range of grey shades from charcoal, through fashionable stone greys, to a simple and pure off-white, the smoke is sure to be a great addition to your home. The colours on offer in the smoke work well as a way of adding a real depth of colour to a lightly decorated living room or front hallway.

products.title: Daphne, Vermillion - Roller Blind
products.description: Daphne's vermillion combines the classic colour scheme of burgundy and taupe to create a stylish, smart filter blind, that lets just enough light through, and sits on an easy-roll mechanism for ease of use and durability. The burgundy and taupe colour combination is a classic one for a living or dining room, and will certainly provide a great starting point for the rest of your dcor. Alternatively, give your bathroom a little twist and use in there instead, accented by matching trimmings.

products.title: Daphne, Summerbright - Roller Blind
products.description: The modern, trendy summerbright from the daphne range combines navy blue with a cool, mustard yellow on a light, off-white background to form a contemporary design with a classic twist that the whole family will love. Work in style with the summerbright taking centre stage in your home office, countered by matching soft furnishings and modern, functional furniture. Or step away from conventional kitchen colour schemes by making this the starting point for your dcor style in the heart of the home.

products.title: Daphne, Bright Delight - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of bright delight from their all-new daphne line is that it allows you to experience the heady relaxing feeling of spring, combined with the hearty and rustic feel of autumn. It's a marriage of colour and style that you won't forget anytime soon. If you want to add a homely touch to the kitchen then consider pairing bright delight with a few other floral features. A wall calendar, a large faced clock, and an apron hanging in the corner are all ways to circumvent the lack of wall space many kitchens have.

products.title: Daphne, Sherbet - Roller Blind
products.description: Daphne sherbet combines a bright and breezy floral pattern with a lightweight homely fabric and some energetic blues and yellows. It's the colours that steal the show and allow you to take your decor to an exciting new place. The way in which they catch your eye from across the room really has to be seen to be believed. Using daphne sherbet in the guest bedroom is a great way to turn your home away from home into the place your guests never want to leave.

products.title: Riviera Stripe, Passion - Roller Blind
products.description: The passion offering from the riviera stripe range is a modern and vibrant blind that contrasts a bold and strong red against fashionable stone greys and off-whites. The variation in stripe width gives this range a truly eclectic feel. This blind works fantastically when you want to add a red theme to your bedroom or living room, but don't find the option of a plain red blind appealing. Alternatively, why not use the stone grey stripes to complement tiling and wooden features in your room, whilst the red will add a splash of colour.

products.description: Inspired by scion's funky animal magic design, this exclusive jolly jungle chalk roller blind brings nature's wildest animals and brings them all together in one wonderful home.
